entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:26 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -33.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 12:49 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -33.6°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -37.6°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 36. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near noon. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 34.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 59 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
